name: @mmisty/cypress-allure-adapter
description: cypress allure adapter to generate allure results during tests execution (Allure TestOps compatible)
author: Taisia Pitko (mmisty) <minydas@yandex.ru>

scripts.test:cov: npm run test:jest && npm run test:jest:cy && npm run cov:merge
scripts.cy:run:cov: COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress COVERAGE=true npm run cy -- run || true
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:cy && npm run build:tests
scripts.cov:merge: node ./.scripts/merge.js --cypress reports/coverage-cypress --jest reports/coverage-jest --out reports/coverage-temp --report reports/coverage-full && npm run cov:fin
scripts.all: npm run pre && npm run cov:check && npm run cov
scripts.pre: rm -rf ./node_modules/.cache lib reports coverage-nyc .nyc_output && npm run lint && npm run build:all && npm run test:cov && npm run cov:merge
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run update:badge && cp package.json ./lib/package.json && cp README.md ./lib/README.md && cp CHANGELOG.md ./lib/CHANGELOG.md && sh .scripts/remove.sh && cd lib && npm version $ver --no-git-tag-version
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run update:badge
scripts.prepublishOnly:
{ echo "Run script 'npm run publish:pack', 'npm run publish:minor', etc from package.json
"; exit 1; }
scripts.publishPack: npm run pack && cd lib && npm publish --tag $TAG
scripts.publish:alpha: export TAG=alpha && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version --tag alpha || npm show . version) --increment -i prerelease  --preid 'alpha') && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish
scripts.publish:beta: export TAG=beta && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version --tag beta || npm show . version) --increment -i prerelease  --preid 'beta') && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish && npm deprecate -f "@mmisty/cypress-allure-adapter@$ver" "this package version has been deprecated"
scripts.publish:alpha:init: export TAG=alpha && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i prerelease  --preid 'alpha') && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish
scripts.publish:patch: export TAG=latest && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i patch) && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish
scripts.publish:minor: export TAG=latest && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i minor) && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish
scripts.publish:major: export TAG=latest && export ver=$(semver $(npm show . version) --increment -i major) && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish
scripts.publish:pack: export TAG=alpha && export ver="0.13.1-alpha.1" && npm run publishPack && npm run postpublish
